about_the_game:
Save the Sacred Tree

Arthur is a squirrel who lives doing what he loves most: eating watermelons. But one day, an evil witch steals the Sacred Tree of his favorite fruit and casts a curse that forces him to jump constantly. Now, unable to stop, Arthur must embark on a dangerous adventure across 5 different worlds to recover the stolen tree and restore his life.

Game Features

  • 2D Platforming with Pixel Art Style and Modern Lighting.

  • Modern Controls with a Twist: Constant jumping! Master your jump timing and turn the curse to your advantage.

  • Learn to combine dodging and gliding to overcome all obstacles on your journey.

  • Original Soundtrack: A custom score perfectly crafted for the adventure.

Content

  • 5 unique worlds Filled with beautiful landscapes and distinct mechanics!

  • 30 levels Packed with obstacles and enemies to conquer!

  • +60 collectibles and timed challenges to push your skills to the limit!

  • +10 unique costumes to dress Arthur!
